name: .QBW File Extension
summary: Learn about .QBW files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a QBW file with Intuit QuickBooks for Windows. To do so, select File → Open or Restore Company... → Open a company file. Then, follow the on-screen prompts to open your QBW file.
You can use QuickBooks for Windows to convert a QBW file to a QuickBooks for Mac company file. To do so, follow the conversion instructions detailed in Intuit's official documentation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
